title: Patron

fields.name: Alignment:
fields.value:
Mafia Head
Attack: None
Defense: Basic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, select a target to have a chat with at night. You will anonymously be able to chat with them, appearing as "**The Patron**". That night, they'll also be given an offer, which they may accept or deny. They must make their choice well before the night ends, and they cannot change their decision. You're notified of the target's decision as soon as they make it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Targets who you have a chat with are roleblocked through immunities, and all non-Mafia visits on them will fail. If they accept your offer, you'll protect them with Powerful defense for that night and the next.
- For each offer accepted, the Patron gains an anonymous vote to use during day phases which appears as "**The Patron**" in the votecount and will not increase majority.
- The game will end if the only remaining players who oppose the Mafia have accepted one of your offers before.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Mafia.
